title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline
body:
i had crashed while playing a game, was able to reconnect and then once the match was finished i was unable to play anymore. trying to reopen the client resolves me with this message "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline" i am very much aware of the "fix" that riot put out to this but it is not working for me. any other solutions are welcome.

**EDIT** Riot fixed the issue. thank you <3

replies.body: I still have this issue however it's only the inability to create a lobby due to "being offline" despite the store working. Am currently working through a solution with Rito upon a ticket request after following virtually every fix available in this forum..
Hey guys, it seems that there was a small hiccup causing login issues.  Is everything okay now?  :D
Nothing still works for me, EUNE server.
{{champion:6}} Someone in the office..*urgot (cough cough)* practicing that ult on computers now.. "small hiccup" {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
i cannot login I have the same issue but sometimes it let me to login and then I am unable to create a lobby game.

I was having the same issue. I did the recommended fix by deleting the line in the config folder. It did not work. So I thought I would do the old uninstall and reinstall. It won't let you reinstall either. Just waiting for someone to fix it or put out another solution.
Same, and it happened to me while I was in the lobby and the "Play" button was grey.. Cmon
Same issue here as well. None of the searched solutions worked.

Having the same issue as OP. Fix didn't work either.

The server status page won't load either.

I can't even open the client, it is saying that I can't connect to their HTTP server and that firewall may be an issue even though I just finished playing a game 2 hours ago and was forced to close the game since the PLAY button wa grey and unclickable.


EDIT: They fixed it, if you still can't log in, you should send in a support ticket
having the same bug right now
